ComicInfo.Title: The Wrath of Mazor Storn; Presenting the Old Codger; Feeding Time; The Dream of Buxom Vampires; Insect Angst; Blood - Murders!; Auto Suggestion; Spider Joy
ComicInfo.Summary:
1. Spider Joy (by S. Clay Wilson : inside front cover)
2. Auto Suggestion (by Kim Deitch)
3. Blood - Murders! (by Roger Brand)
4. Insect Angst (by S. Clay Wilson)
5. The Dream of Bxom Vampires (by Justin Green)
6. Feeding Time (by Manuel [i.e. Spain] Rodriguez)
7. Presenting the Old Codger (by Jim Osborne)
8. The Wrath of Mazor Storn (by Rory Hayes ; story reprinted in Where Demented Wented: The Art and Comics of Rory Hayes)
9. Ada (illustration on back cover by Willie Mendes)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 10:24:12. [CVDB359699]
